name: KCP Opinionated On-Ramp + Pick Winner Loop
notes: Render path: KCP_ProjectInit.db_path -> all KCP db_path inputs.
Render path: KCP_VariantPack -> KCP_KeyframeSetSave then KSampler IMAGE batch -> KCP_KeyframeSetItemSaveBatch.images.
Winner path: KCP_KeyframeSetPick.set_id -> KCP_KeyframeSetLoadBatch.set_id and KCP_KeyframeSetItemPick.set_id.
Winner path: KCP_KeyframeSetItemPick.item_json -> KCP_KeyframeSetMarkPicked.item_json and -> KCP_KeyframePromoteToAsset.item_json.
